live_updates: Technicians are still on site working to resolve this as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience.
49010.summary: Some customers in the Killarney area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
49010.title: Apr 29 - Vancouver (Killarney) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
